trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the name of a key storage provider (KSP) for use with Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.
trans-unit.target: 封装用于下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> class is a utility class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>类是一个实用工具类。

trans-unit.source: It consists of static properties, comparison methods, and a private, internally maintained string that specifies a key storage provider.
trans-unit.target: 它包含的静态属性、 比较方法和私有、 内部维护字符串，指定密钥存储提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The static properties return <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> objects.
trans-unit.target: 静态属性返回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>对象。

trans-unit.source: Each object's internal string is initialized to the provider name that corresponds to the name of the static property.
trans-unit.target: 每个对象的内部字符串初始化为提供程序名称对应于静态属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this class to create objects for provider types that are not covered by the static properties.
trans-unit.target: 此类还可用于创建未涵盖的静态属性的提供程序类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Several CNG classes (such as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>) accept <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> objects through a `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 某些 CNG 类 (如<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>) 接受<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>对象通过`provider`参数。

trans-unit.source: When the class receives the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> object, it retrieves the embedded provider name by calling the object's <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.Provider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当类接收<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>对象，它通过调用对象的检索嵌入的提供程序名称<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider.Provider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> serves as an enumeration of well-known providers.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>用作众所周知的提供程序的枚举。

trans-unit.source: It lets you identify a provider by using a strongly typed value instead of a string.
trans-unit.target: 它允许你通过使用强类型化的值而不一个字符串，标识提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key storage provider (KSP) to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> class internally maintain the provider name specified by the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>类内部维持相关指定的提供程序名称`provider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose of this constructor is to provide a method for creating <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> objects for KSPs that are not represented by the static properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的主要用途是提供用于创建的方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>对象不表示的静态属性的 Ksp<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: This capacity enables future [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] releases, service packs, and third-party developers to add new providers, which can be accessed just like the providers that are currently available.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许将来[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本、 service pack 和第三方开发人员能够添加新的提供程序，可以访问当前可用的提供程序一样。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="provider" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="provider" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="provider" /> parameter length is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="provider" /> 参数的长度为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to be compared to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified object to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter is a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> that specifies the same key storage provider(KSP) as the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 参数是一个指定与当前对象相同的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An object to be compared to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="other" /> parameter specifies the same key storage provider (KSP) as the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="other" /> 参数指定与当前对象相同的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP)，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates a hash value for the name of the key storage provider (KSP) that is embedded in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 生成一个嵌入在当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象中的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 名称的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the embedded KSP name.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入的 KSP 名称的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object that specifies the Microsoft Smart Card Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象，该对象指定 Microsoft 智能卡密钥存储提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the Microsoft Smart Card Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，指定 Microsoft 智能卡密钥存储提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object that specifies the Microsoft Software Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象，该对象指定 Microsoft 软件密钥存储提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the Microsoft Software Key Storage Provider.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，指定 Microsoft 软件密钥存储提供程序。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies a KSP.
trans-unit.target: 指定 KSP 的对象。

trans-unit.source: A second object, to be compared to the object that is identified by the <c>left</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>left</c> 参数标识的对象进行比较的另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> objects specify the same key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象是否指定相同的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two objects represent the same KSP; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个对象表示相同的 KSP，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies a KSP.
trans-unit.target: 指定 KSP 的对象。

trans-unit.source: A second object, to be compared to the object that is identified by the <c>left</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>left</c> 参数标识的对象进行比较的另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> objects do not represent the same key storage provider (KSP).
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象是否不表示相同的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two objects do not represent the same KSP; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个对象不表示相同的 KSP，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key storage provider (KSP) that the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object specifies.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象指定的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The embedded KSP name.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入的 KSP 名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key storage provider (KSP) that the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> object specifies.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProvider" /> 对象指定的密钥存储提供程序 (KSP) 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The embedded KSP name.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入的 KSP 名称。
